main event: A reddish-orange ball was observed in Beeville, Texas on July 6, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared at 10:30 p.m. and moved slowly before disappearing behind trees., The sighting lasted for about 3 to 5 seconds., The observer was a control tower operator at Chase Field., The weather was sunny with scattered clouds., The sighting was recorded as part of Project Blue Book, indicating a formal observation.
